Unlike other email services, Forward Ema: Unlike other email services, Forward Email does not store your email in a shared relational database with other users' emails. Instead it uses individually encrypted SQLite mailboxes with your email. This means that your emails are sandboxed from everyone else, and therefore bad actors (or even rogue employees) cannot access your mailbox. You can learn more about our approach to email encryption by clicking here.
